components.component:
org.richfaces.ModalPanel org.richfaces.ModalPanel org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlModalPanel org.richfaces.component.UIModalPanel
org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlModalPanelComponentTest org.ajax4jsf.tests.AbstractAjax4JsfTestCase
The <rich:modalPanel> component implements a modal dialog window. All operations in the main application window are locked out while this window is active. Opening and closing the window is done through client JavaScript code.
header Define the header content
controls Defines the control elements on the header
org.richfaces.ModalPanelRenderer org/richfaces/htmlModalPanel.jspx
modalPanel org.richfaces.taglib.ModalPanelTag org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
&ui_component_attributes; &ui_input_attributes; &ui_output_attributes; &html_style_attributes;
headerClass java.lang.String CSS style(s) is/are to be applied to component header when this component is rendered ""
controlsClass java.lang.String CSS style(s) is/are to be applied to component controls when this component is rendered ""
width int Attribute defines width of component. Default value is "300". -1
height int Attribute defines height of component. Default value is "200". -1
minWidth int Attribute defines min width of component. Default value is "10". If the value is less then 10, a "IllegalArgumentException" exception is thrown. -1
minHeight int Attribute defines min height of component. Default value is "10". If the value is less then 10, a "IllegalArgumentException" exception is thrown. -1
left java.lang.String Attribute defines X position of component left-top corner. Default value is "auto". "auto"
top java.lang.String Attribute defines Y position of component left-top corner. Default value is "auto". "auto"
resizeable boolean If "true" there is possibility to change component size. Default value is "true". true
moveable boolean If "true" there is possibility to move component. Default value is "true". true
zindex int Attribute is similar to the standard HTML attribute and can specify window. Default value is "100". placement relative to the content 100
shadowOpacity java.lang.String HTML CSS class attribute of element for pop-up suggestion content
shadowDepth java.lang.String Pop-up shadow depth for suggestion content
onshow java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when the modal panel is displayed ""
onhide java.lang.String The client side script method to be called after the modal panel is hidden ""
onmove java.lang.String The client side script method to be called before the modal panel is moved ""
onbeforeshow java.lang.String The client side script method to be called before the modal panel is opened ""
onbeforehide java.lang.String The client side script method to be called before the modal panel is hidden ""
onresize java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when the modal panel is resized ""
showWhenRendered boolean If "true" value for this attribute makes a modal panel opened as default. Default value is "false" false
keepVisualState boolean If "true" modalPanel should save state after submission. Default value is "false". false
visualOptions java.lang.Object Defines options that were specified on the client side
tridentIVEngineSelectBehavior java.lang.String How to handle HTML SELECT-based controls in IE 6? - "disable" - default, handle as usual, use disabled="true" to hide SELECT controls - "hide" - use visibility="hidden" to hide SELECT controls "disable"
autosized boolean If "true" modalPanel should be autosizeable. Default value is "false". false
overlapEmbedObjects boolean If "true" modalPanel creates iframe to overlap embed objects like PDF on a page. Default value is "false". false
requiredMessage java.lang.String
required boolean false
immediate boolean false
validatorMessage java.lang.String
converterMessage
localValueSet localValueSet
valid valid
valueChangeListener valueChangeListener
onmaskclick java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a left mouse button is clicked outside the modal panel ""
onmaskdblclick java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a left mouse button is double-clicked outside the modal panel ""
onmaskcontextmenu java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a right mouse button is clicked outside the modal panel ""
onmaskmouseup java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a mouse button is released outside the modal panel ""
onmaskmousedown java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a mouse button is pressed down outside the modal panel ""
onmaskmousemove java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a pointer is moved outside the modal panel ""
onmaskmouseover java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a pointer is moved onto the modal panel ""
onmaskmouseout java.lang.String The client side script method to be called when a pointer is moved away from the modal panel ""
label java.lang.String A localized user presentable name for this component.
converter javax.faces.convert.Converter
value java.lang.Object
validator javax.faces.validator.Validator
trimOverlayedElements boolean Defines whether to trim or not elements inside modalPanel. Default value is "true" true
domElementAttachment java.lang.String Defines the DOM element, which stacking context will assimilate the modalPanel. Possible values: "body", "form", "parent". Default value is "body".
